name: Skullfane
cardText:
[fanfare] Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an amulet from among them and put it onto your field. Put the remaining cards into your cemetery.
Whenever an amulet you control leaves the field, deal 2 damage to each enemy leader and enemy follower on the field.

name: Hallowed Dogma
cardText:
[quick]
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal an amulet from among them and add it to your hand. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
